#Commit2
```{r commit2}

subset <- df %>%
  count(screen_name) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  slice (1:25)

#str(subset)

subset %>%
  mutate(screen_name = as.factor(screen_name),
         screen_name = forcats::fct_reorder(screen_name, n)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = screen_name, y = n)) + 
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip()

str(subset)
```
